alert.note: Alert for Death Valley National Park; Eastern Mojave Desert, Including the Mojave National Preserve; Owens Valley; Western Mojave Desert (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued March 09 at 12:44AM PST until March 10 at 10:00PM PST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM TO 10 PM PST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...Owens Valley, Death Valley National Park, Western and Eastern Mojave Desert. * WHEN...From 6 AM to 10 PM PST Friday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. Patchy blowing dust could impact travel. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Greatest impacts to US-395 will be from Owens Lake southward where strong crosswinds can be expected.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Death Valley National Park; Eastern Mojave Desert, Including the Mojave National Preserve; Owens Valley; Western Mojave Desert
